cards.title: The Set List
setup: At the start of the game, this card, {SliceCharacter}, {ValentineCharacter}, {BloodlaceCharacter}, and {RickyGCharacter} enter play, “Warming Up” side up.
Search the villain deck for all Guitarist, Vocalist, Bassist, and Drummer cards, shuffle them, and place them beneath this card face down. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, this card flips.
cards.advanced: At the start of the game, reveal cards from beneath this one until {H - 2} cards with different keywords are revealed. Play those cards. Shuffle the rest and replace them face down beneath this card.
flippedGameplay: Cards beneath this one are not considered in play. Guitarist, Vocalist, Bassist, and Drummer cards are indestructible. Destroyed villain characteres are removed from the game.
Whenever a card beneath this one is revealed, play it if it shares a keyword with a card in play. Otherwise, place it face down on the bottom of the stack and play the top card beneath this one.
At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card beneath this one.

At the end of the villain turn, if {H - 2} or fewer villain characters remain in play, the villain target with the highest HP deals each hero 2 sonic damage and plays the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flippedAdvanced: When a villain target flips, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment.

openingLines.default: We are Screamachine! And you lot are out of your league!
openingLines.GyrosaurCharacter: VALENTINE: You wrecked our show! Well, now we'll wreck you! [b]And[/b] rock you!
openingLines.RenegadeGyrosaurCharacter: BLOODLACE: I see you came to our newest show! Prepare to be blown away! Literally!
openingLines.SpeedDemonGyrosaurCharacter: SLICE: Whoa, the space turtle's got a radical new look.
openingLines.CaptainGyrosaurCharacter: RICKY G: Did we miss something? Why is there a zombie pirate turtle?

cards.title: Ricky G
gameplay: If there are ever 3 Drummer cards in play, Ricky G flips.
{Drum} Select the villain target with the lowest HP.{BR}        Reduce damage dealt to that target by 1 until{BR}        the start of the next villain turn.
flippedGameplay: All other villain targets are indestructible and immune damage.
At the end of the villain turn, discard the top card of the villain deck. If it shows {Drum} on it, {RickyGCharacter} deals each hero target 3 melee damage.

cards.title: Slice
gameplay: If there are ever 3 Guitarist cards in play, Slice flips.
{Guitar} {SliceCharacter} deals the hero with the second{BR}        lowest HP {H - 1} sonic damage.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the villain turn, {SliceCharacter} deals the hero with the second lowest HP {H - 1} sonic damage. Targets in that hero's play area cannot deal damage until the start of the next villain turn.

cards.title: Bloodlace
gameplay: If there are ever 3 Bassist cards in play, Bloodlace flips.
{Bass} Each other villain target regains {H - 2} HP.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the villain turn, the villain target with the lowest HP deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} melee damage and regains {H} HP.

cards.title: Valentine
gameplay: If there are ever 3 Vocalist cards in play, Valentine flips.
{Vocal} {ValentineCharacter} deals the 2 hero targets with{BR}         the highest HP {H - 2} psychic damage.
flippedGameplay: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {ValentineCharacter} deals the hero with the highest HP {H - 1} sonic damage and {H - 2} psychic damage.

cards.title: Biosurge
body: When this card enters play, if {BloodlaceCharacter} is not in play, reveal the top card beneath The Set List

activatableAbilities.name: {Bass}
activatableAbilities.text: Increase the next damage dealt by {BloodlaceCharacter} by 2.

cards.title: Can't Stop the Music
body: When this card enters play, if {BloodlaceCharacter} is not in play, reveal the top card beneath The Set List

activatableAbilities.name: {Bass}
activatableAbilities.text: If {BloodlaceCharacter} is in play, the villain target with the lowest HP regains 2 HP.

cards.flavorText: As far as the bandmembers{BR}were concerned, the so-called{BR}'heroes' were responsible for the{BR}destruction of their concert.

cards.title: Death Metal
body: Each hero may destroy 1 of their ongoing or equipment cards.
The villain target with the highest HP deals each hero that did not destroy a card this way 3 psychic damage.
Activate all {Vocal} and {Bass} effects.

flavorQuotes.text: Strange powers? Maybe their{BR}music is just that bad.

cards.flavorReference: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void #30

cards.title: Harsh Note
body: Increase the next damage dealt by a villain target by {H}.
Activate all {Guitar} and {Vocal} effects.

flavorQuotes.text: Truth is a loud and bitter medicine.

activatableAbilities.name: {Vocal}

flavorQuotes.text: We're in sync like you wouldn't{BR}believe. After we crush 'em we gotta{BR}get back in the studio and jam!

body: Each villain target deals the target with the highest HP 2 projectile damage.

cards.title: Percussive Wave
body: When this card enters play, activate all {Drum} and {Guitar} effects. At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.
Whenever a villain target would be dealt damage, reduce that damage by X. X is 2 if the damage is 4 or more, 1 if the damage is exactly 3, and 0 otherwise.

flavorQuotes.text: Actually, I could dance to this.

body: The villain target with the lowest HP regains {H - 1} HP. {ValentineCharacter} deals each non-villain target 1 sonic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You gotta be considerate{BR}to the old folks in the back who{BR}don't hear so well. Crank it!
